<title>Expert Firmware Development Services — ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="As part of our firmware development services, ITRex implements RTOS solutions, customizes operating systems for low-power, low-memory devices, creates bare-metal firmware solutions, and assists with OTA updates and security audits. Collaborate with our firmware company today to beat your competition tomorrow!" />

yoast_head_json.title: Expert Firmware Development Services — ITRex
yoast_head_json.description: As part of our firmware development services, ITRex implements RTOS solutions, customizes operating systems for low-power, low-memory devices, creates bare-metal firmware solutions, and assists with OTA updates and security audits. Collaborate with our firmware company today to beat your competition tomorrow!
